channel.title: Blog on Albert Chu
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Albert Chu

item.title: Building a Go-kart from Scratch
item.description:
Above is the final version of the go-kart, completed just in time for a few test-drives before COVID shut down campus.

When I started the Automotive Engineering Club with a few friends, we had intended it as a weekly space for us to come together to profess our love for cars and discuss hot topics like the latest advancements in regenerative breaking as well as Elon Musk and Tesla’s “100 hour work weeks.”

After a group visit to a local mechanic’s shop however, someone suggested building a car or motorcycle as a group, and after some debate, we settled on ideal compromise between complexity and practicality (we’re still highschoolers after all)â€”the go-kart.

A close-up of the engine after we first put it together and were testing its output:

Here’s an image of a gokart racer in action:

item.title: The Underwater MATE robot
item.description: [The Van de Graaf Canon](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Canons_of_page_construction#Van_de_Graaf_canon) ## Mane refeci capiebant unda mulcebat Victa caducifer, malo vulnere contra dicere aurato, ludit regale, voca! Retorsit colit est profanae esse virescere furit nec; iaculi matertera et visa est, viribus. Divesque creatis, tecta novat collumque vulnus est, parvas. **Faces illo pepulere** tempus adest. Tendit flamma, ab opes virum sustinet, sidus sequendo urbis. Iubar proles corpore raptos vero auctor imperium; sed et huic: manus caeli Lelegas tu lux.
